Hall of Beginnings.description: Large marble columns tower over you, bearing the weight of a vast stone ceiling. An ornate stone archway covers the north area of the room, containing a shimmering, purple portal. A lady garbed in a white dress stands in front of the portal, barring entry to those she sees fit.

portal.description: Attempting to peer around the woman standing in front, you can make out tall buildings, and cobbled pathways.
